room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This company knows how to do escape rooms right!  Prison break is HARD and very FUN.  Super rewarding if you escape.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was our first time doing an Escape Room and Prison Break was awesome!! We had 4 in our group and it worked out good, I think with to many people it would have tight. Lots of puzzles to solve so dont waste any time!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: That was my first experience in an escape room! We took on prison break! So looking forward to escaping again! So much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We have played four rooms in different locations around DFW area and this was the BEST we have played yet. The prison set was awesome and that really adds to the experience. The game also flowed well and the clues connected - my only tip is to go fast as there are several puzzles to solve. Our game guide was great as he gave us hints and not the answer. We almost made it - just 1 minute more and we would have escaped. This set the bar high! I think this would be best experienced with 4 people total (6 max) so try to go in an off time.  We can't wait to try the others!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Was so awesome we did all of the rooms in one weekend! Room guides were fantastic. We will definitely be back there!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We visited the Escape Room in Grapevine. There were 5 of us, and we did Prison Break. It was a lot of fun! Our staff was very helpful and polite. Can't wait to do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by The Escape Game Dallas in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We selected the Prison Break option. Very difficult but exciting and fun. Will definitely be doing this again!
